objnote.p: Blake developed this subject and basic composition through a series of seven or eight further drawings, including Butlin 120 recto, 120A recto and verso, 121, 122 recto and verso, 124, and possibly untraced 125, *Christ as the Good Shepherd*. The verso of this monochrome wash drawing bears a pencil drawing titled by Butlin 123 verso as *Rough Sketch of Two or Three Figures in a Landscape*.

illustration.illusobjdesc: The general theme and subject of this composition were probably influenced by several biblical passages, including Ruth 2:1-17, I Samuel 12:16-19, and Matthew 9:38. This monochrome wash depicts a gathering of seven people of different ages, male and female, in the foreground. There are other figures in less detailed sketch near the upper left of the wash. The group furthest back consists of eight or nine figures, two of whom raise their arms to the sky. They stand in front of a building, possibly a barn. In front of the group of figures, two figures with more discernible features walk together. At least one figure is male. They appear to be disgruntled and may be arguing. The figures may be standing in a field. Positioned prominently in the center of the wash, a man, probably Christ, with a beard and curly hair stands and looks down toward the group of figures to his left. He extends his arms across his body, to the right, and his palms face up. He may gesture toward the girl to his right. The girl has her long hair in what appears to be a loose plait. She bends her left leg to kneel on the ground. Her right leg is not visible and likely extends in front of her. She appears to have a bushel of wheat in her lap. An older bearded male stands to the right of the central figure. He extends and raises his arms toward the sky, holding his hands closely together. To the left of the central figure, three adults and one child kneel on the ground. Of this group, the two figures on the left are male. One male figure has long white hair and a beard. His eyes are closed. To his right there is a male figure with curly hair, but his face is not visible. To his right a female figure with her right arm extended in front of her and her head bowed in supplication. Her hair is long and curled. A child with curly hair and of indiscernible gender kneels in front of her with its head resting in her lap. The sky appears to be dark with storm clouds. Lightning or parts of the clouds extend toward and touch the field in the background. If looked at closely, there also appears to be the barely-discernible sketch of a figure wrapped within the clouds.

component.illusobjdesc: An older bearded male stands to the right of the central figure. He extends and raises his arms toward the sky, holding his hands closely together.
The group furthest back consists of eight or nine figures, two of whom raise their arms to the clouded sky.
In front of the group of figures, two figures with more discernible features walk together. At least one figure is male. They appear to be disgruntled and may be arguing.

The girl has her long hair in what appears to be a loose plait. She bends her left leg to kneel on the ground. Her right leg is not visible and likely extends in front of her. She appears to have a bushel of wheat in her lap.
Among the group that kneels near the central figure, the furthest male figure has long white hair and a beard. His eyes are closed.
To the elderly kneeling man's right there is a male figure with curly hair, but his face is not visible.
To the younger man's right is a woman with her right arm held out to the central figure as her head bows in supplication. Her hair is long and curled.
A child with curly hair and of indiscernible gender kneels in front of the woman with its head resting in her lap.
Based on the sketching in the middle of the piece of a large, even-cut field, this wash is likely in wheat or other grain field that is ready to be reaped.
The background group stands in front of a building, possibly a barn.

The sky appears to be dark with storm clouds. Lightning or parts of the clouds extend toward and touch the field in the background. If looked at closely, there also appears to be the barely-discernible sketch of a figure wrapped within the clouds.
